reviewHighlights.text: It's really not as bad as people say. Its not a good sonic game but its a pretty good video game. Also has an amazing soundtrack lol
Imma be honest here... I don't understand the hate behind this game. It runs really well on Steam, it's not buggy or laggy and it's just genuinely fun...
